1.: Suborbital Spaceplane Challenge

The Spaceplane challenge is best for good Spaceplane/Spaceshuttle engineers. You have following objectives, if you enter this challenge:

Build an good Spaceplane, launch it into Ballistic Trajectory and Make 8 Screenshots: 1. In the VAB, 2. On Launchpad, 3. Leaved Launchpad, 4. At Ascent, 5. After Engines Cutoff, 6. At Reentry, 7. Landing Apporach, 8. Landed.

The Rules:

1. You can use Stock, C7, C7 Experimental and Silisko.

2. The minimal apoapsis altitude is 72 km.

3. You have to make an safe reentry and land without any damage.

Points:

Safe Launch: +1000 Points

No SRB\'s: +500 Points

Single Stage: +750 Points

Apoapsis higher that 80 km: +250 Points

Apoapsis higher that 100 km: +500 Points

Safe Reentry: +2500 Points

Safe Landing: +5000 Points

Each Destroyed Part: -100 Points

Each Killed Crew Member: -1000 Points
